# Business Consulting and Change Management Services Solution (SPTS)
## Tender Details
*Title:* Business Consulting and Change Management Services Solution (SPTS)
*Reference Number:* PW-22-01014357
*Amendment Number:* 3
*Solicitation Number:* 22-58091
*Publication Date:* November 25, 2022
*Tender Closing Date:* December 16, 2022, 00:00:00
*Amendment Date:* December 2, 2022
## Service Requirement
*Service Classification:* Consulting Services (R019F)
*Solutions-Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement:*
The National Research Council Canada requires strategic, policy, and research support services as part of its broader efforts to advance its digital vision and transformation.
## Eligibility
This tender is open to only [35] selected suppliers who have expressed interest in participating in the tendering process.
## Terms of the Contract
*Duration:* From contract award date to June 30, 2024
*Estimated Level of Effort:* 1.5 years + 2 optional years
## Contracting Authority
*Contact Name:* Philippe G. Cléroux
*Email:* philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
## Notice and Attachment
*Notice Type:* Competitive Request for Proposal
*Method of Supply:* Task and Solution Professional Services (TSPS)
*Note:*
Prospective suppliers must access the National Project Portal (NPP) for instructions on how to participate in the procurement process.
## Trade Agreements
*Free Trade Agreements:* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
